summary: This is a collection of equipment designed to give you a character who knows what he is doing right off the bat and just wants to have fun instead of actually working for your equipment and levels.   WARNING:  NON-IMMERSIVE
descriptionHtml:
[size=6]READ THE DESCRIPTION
[/size]


The whole idea behind this mod is to create a stealthy ranger-esque looking character that can be considered a bit intimidating, but not TOO intimidating.  This is also going for a realistic play through, as evidenced by the inclusion of the mod Frostfall in  the required list.  It is a bit game breaking, but this is more for if you have played Skyrim several times, and just want a playthrough where you can just do whatever you want.   I have included a few pieces of armor from some mods, which are listed below.  I take [url=#]no credit[img]http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png[/img][/url] for any of these mods or what they contain.   I only put this thing together.   I own NONE of it.

Please let me know if any of the items don't work or the [url=#]optional[img]http://cdncache-a.akamaihd.net/items/it/img/arrow-10x10.png[/img][/url] files with the enchantable items have items that won't enchant.   I will either remove them, or try to get them to work properly.  Thanks!!!

This is a equipment file that will set you up like how my character is (before enchantments and re-enforcing their armor/weapons)
Note:   This batch-file requires the following mods/DLC:
Skyrim (Obviously)
Dawnguard
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19733/?http://]Immersive Armors[/url] 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27644/?]Immersive Weapons[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33391/?]Face Masks of Skyrim[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16438/?]Bandoliers - Bags and Pouches[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21720/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D21720&pUp=1]Left Hand Rings[/url] 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50528/?]Scoped Bows[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14152/?]Leveler's Tower[/url] 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11163/?]Frostfall - Hypothermia Camping Survival[/url]



PERMISSIONS:

THIS IS THE ORIGINAL POST.   IF you see this mod anywhere else, that is a copy.  This is the current one (although what I would update about this is BEYOND me)


CREDITS
The creators of all of the aforementioned mods
Nexus for this site
Bethesda for Skyrim
My Dad for the PC
Dell for making the PC
Fanfiction ...... BECAUSE FANFICTION (Nuff' said)



You can also find me at [url=https://www.fanfiction.net/u/2505695/Zgogery]My Account at Fanfiction.net[/url]
author: Zgogery
